```{r}
library(bio3d)

s <- read.fasta("A16950824_mutant_seq.fa")

s
```

Score residue conservation
```{r}
mut <- conserv(s) < 1
sum(mut)
```

I have 4 mutations

What positions are they in?
```{r}
pos <- which(mut)
```

What are the mutations?
```{r}
mutation <- function(x) {
  s$ali[,x]
}

mutation(pos)
```

```{r}
paste( s$ali[1,pos], pos, s$ali[2,pos], sep = "")
```
